definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Trouble develops, however, when any human instinct or appetite causes overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 但假使人的欲求或喜好过度膨胀则会带来麻烦。

sentences.english: If they were to catch me, they would shoot me.
sentences.chinese: 假使有人捉住我，他们就会枪毙我。

sentences.english: And what if we were suddenly thrown into such a world?
sentences.chinese: 假使我们突然被扔进那样那样一个世界会怎样？

sentences.english: You can’t get there if you can’t see it.
sentences.chinese: 假使你看不见它，又怎么能到达那儿呢。

sentences.english: We must, indeed, all hang together or, most assuredly, we shall all hang separately.
sentences.chinese: 假使我们不团结在一起，我们将分开被绞死。

sentences.english: That matter would change their tune if they knew it.
sentences.chinese: 那件事假使他们知道了，会使他们改变态度的。

sentences.english: For such are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 那等人是假使徒，行事诡诈，装作基督使徒的模样。

sentences.english: You could either buy an MP3 or go to Yunnan for a trip if youpbutt the exin the morning.
sentences.chinese: 假使考试过关，你可以买一个MP3或去云南玩一趟。

sentences.english: When we actually see the difficulties that other people face.
sentences.chinese: 假使我们真能看到别人的困难。

sentences.english: Do not deceive me, you knew even if your lie I all can believe.
sentences.chinese: 不要骗我，你理解假使你的诳言我都会自信。

sentences.english: If the car won't stculture, try pushing it.
sentences.chinese: 假使这车发动不了，试着推一推它。

sentences.english: If you're lucky enough to have snow, don't shovel the walkway.
sentences.chinese: 假使你足够幸运遇到下雪的天气，切记不要清扫走道。

sentences.english: Now, I get it! How is someone supposed to find you, if you aren't there?
sentences.chinese: 假使有人在找你，而你又不在，这要怎么办才好呢？

sentences.english: If they donnot like you for your worst: then they donnot deserve you for your best.
sentences.chinese: 假使他们不能接受最差的你，也不配具有最好的你。

sentences.english: She shall go, if needs must.
sentences.chinese: 假使非去不可的话，她就得去。

sentences.english: And what if the revolt of July did cost a hundred and twenty millions?
sentences.chinese: 假使七月十四日得花一亿二千万，那又怎样呢？

definition: variant of 那麼|那么[na4 me5]
so much so that/to the extent that/even
